name: Gargantua Arena
description:
The game is intended to be a local multiplayer game. If you can get a friend to play with, go for it! There is an A.I. though to practice your skills, so you can play it in a single player mode aswell.

This game is my entry to the Timdred game jam. It's made in 48 hours (actually in about a day). Except audio (music and sfx - see credits section) it's made from scratch by me.  Have fun!

Used technology

  • Godot Engine
  • Inkscape + Gimp
  • Audacity

Audio credits

I took free audio from opengameart.org and freesound.com:

  • game music: Zefz on opengameart.org
  •  menu music: Zander Noriega at opengameart.org  https://twitter.com/codingobviously
  • sound effects:
    • Unnamed (Viktor.Hahn@web.de) at OpenGameArt.org 
    • https://freesound.org/people/StormwaveAudio/ 
    • Michel Baradari at OpenGameArt.org
    • https://freesound.org/people/MortisBlack/ 
    •  https://freesound.org/people/Misty_Audio/
